author: Dudemeister

changelog.release_notes:
Hey folks,
ERRORS and disgusting layers everywhere. - fixed that disgusting white rectangle in the upper right corner where the battery status is supposed to be;

Well, now everything should be in blue or black depends on your Pebble ;-)
To the future, Marty!

Hello fellow 1337s,
maaaan I almost forgot that they released the Pebble Time. XD
So, major change is:

- added colors for fancy appearance

have fun and enjoy life
- added battery status in upper right corner with charging indicator

description: My first watchface with 'leet-speak-clockwork' and terminal commands to add a little geek'ish-touch. I just wanted to do something that not everybody is able to read/understand. Guess, there will be some other information like bluetooth status in the near future. I hope you guys like it.
title: L337_W47CH_W/C0L0R
